name: Add info and links of Zoom recordings to a Google Sheet and upload to Google Drive
description:
When a recording is completed on Zoom, this scenario instantly receives the details, adds the info and the recording's link to a Google Sheet and uploads the file to Google Drive.

This template uses this [Google Sheet example.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1JinW-f-vyF2Hsi8-7ZWhvxCPKIbElU-4ETrYke_TEPU/edit?usp=sharing)
